title: Chicago Ridge-3 Bedroom-1 Bath Coach House For Rent
posting_body: Chicago Ridge-3 Bedroom-1 Bath Coach House For Rent-Another House(next door) on Property
Cute Cozy Coach Upgraded House on Beautiful View Lot!
Open Concept Kitchen/Living Room-Greige-Ceramic Marble tile
Cats Ok-Proof of Rabies Shots for all cats that go outside-Sorry No Dogs/Puppies
You Must have Rental Insurance--the day you move in
Small Dogs under 30 pounds or less over 2 years old/sorry no puppies
You must keep the property clean inside and outside.
You must be able to maintain the property.
Credit Check-We will consider tenants with bad credit or one foreclosure or one eviction (nothing over one)
Income Verification and Security Deposit required.

Chicago Ridge, IL is in the southwest suburbs near ,Alsip, Palos Heights, Palos Hills and is really close to Oak Lawn, Crestwood, Tinley Park, Oak Forest, Palos Park, Bridgeview, Burbank, Mt Greenwood, Merrionette Park, Blue Island, Orland, Beverly,Worth and lots of other very nice communities southwest of Chicago.
